definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: 2 ms. [[אַל־תִּתְרַע]] [[אֶת־בַּעַל אָָף]] Pr 22:24 do not make companionship with a bad-tempered man; perhaps also 3 fpl. [[תִּתְרָעֶינׇה]] Is 11:7 (Lag:Or. i. 21; Deceased Wife’s Sister 399 Brd Du Che Hpt) cow and bear shall be each other’s companions; + Inf. cstr. [[הִתְרָעׂת]] Pr 18:24 (Toy, for MT [[הִתְרׂעֵעַ]]) there are [[[יֵשׁ]], for [[אִישׁ]]] friends (merely) to be companions (v. II. [[רעע]] ad fin.).
